member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.Testing.Light.Engine.WebTestTagExpressionEvaluator
member.summary: Evaluate tag expressions
member.remarks:
Tag expressions are derived from the following EBNF grammar: {Expression} := {Expression} @ {Term} | {Expression} - {Term} | {Term} {Term} := {Term} ^ {Factor} | {Factor} {Factor} := !{Factor} | ({Expression}) | {Tag} {Tag} := All | Fail | [^InvalidCharacters]+
The non-terminals for {Expression} and {Term} will be left factored in the recursive descent parser below.
